languages.text: "Слава о вас ширится! Поверьте, я знаю, ведь еще до заточения в монастырь у меня были... друзья, умелые в добыче разных {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}диковинок{/g}. Необычных вещиц, которые ошибочно считают запретными. Освободившись, я немедленно написала им письма, несущие благую весть о вас! О, как они были заинтригованы!"

"Your fame grows! I can tell — after all, before I was confined to that monastery, I made some... friends who were very good at procuring all manner of {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}oddities{/g} — remarkable things that people mistakenly brand as forbidden. Shortly after my release, I contacted them to spread the good word about you! Oh, how intrigued they were!"
languages.original_text: "Слава о вас ширится! Remarkable things that people mistakenly brand as forbidden. Shortly after my release, I contacted them to spread the good word about you! Oh, how intrigued they were!"

languages.text: "Euer Ruhm wächst. Ich kann das beurteilen, denn bevor ich in dieses Kloster gesperrt wurde, hatte ich einige ... Freunde, die sehr gut darin waren, allerlei {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}Absonderlichkeiten{/g} zu beschaffen ... bemerkenswerte Dinge, die die Leute fälschlicherweise als verboten betrachten. Kurz nach meiner Freilassung habe ich sie kontaktiert, um Euch in den höchsten Tönen zu loben! Oh, sie waren so fasziniert."
languages.original_text: "Your fame grows! I can tell — after all, before I was confined to that monastery, I made some... friends who were very good at procuring all manner of {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}oddities{/g} — remarkable things that people mistakenly brand as forbidden. Shortly after my release, I contacted them to spread the good word about you! Oh, how intrigued they were!"

languages.text: « Votre notoriété ne cesse de croître ! Et je suis bien placée pour le savoir. Avant d'être confinée dans ce monastère, je me suis fait quelques... amis dotés d'un certain talent dans l'art de se procurer toutes sortes de {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}bizarreries{/g} que les gens considèrent à tort comme interdites. Peu après ma libération, je les ai contactés afin qu'ils parlent de vous autour d'eux ! Oh, comme ils étaient intrigués ! »
languages.original_text: "Your fame grows! I can tell — after all, before I was confined to that monastery, I made some... friends who were very good at procuring all manner of {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}oddities{/g} — remarkable things that people mistakenly brand as forbidden. Shortly after my release, I contacted them to spread the good word about you! Oh, how intrigued they were!"

Peu après ma libération, je les ai contactés afin qu'ils parlent de vous autour d'eux ! Oh, comme ils étaient intrigués ! »

« Votre notoriété ne cesse de croître ! Et je suis bien placée pour le savoir. Avant d'être confinée dans ce monastère, je me suis fait quelques... amis dotés d'un certain talent dans l'art de se procurer toutes sortes de bizarreries que les gens considèrent à tort comme interdites. Peu après ma libération, je les ai contactés afin qu'ils parlent de vous autour d'eux ! Oh, comme ils étaient intrigués ! »

languages.text: «¡Su fama crece! Puedo verlo. Al fin y al cabo, antes de ser confinada en el monasterio hice una serie de... amistades que sabían dónde conseguir toda clase de {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}cosas{/g}, incluyendo tesoros que algunos querrían erróneamente prohibir. Al poco tiempo de ser libre, ¡contacté con ellos para proclamar su buena noticia! ¡Estaban muy interesados!».
languages.original_text: "Your fame grows! I can tell — after all, before I was confined to that monastery, I made some... friends who were very good at procuring all manner of {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}oddities{/g} — remarkable things that people mistakenly brand as forbidden. Shortly after my release, I contacted them to spread the good word about you! Oh, how intrigued they were!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Su fama crece! Puedo verlo. Al fin y al cabo, antes de ser confinada en el monasterio hice una serie de... amistades que sabían dónde conseguir toda clase de cosas, incluyendo tesoros que algunos querrían erróneamente prohibir. Al poco tiempo de ser libre, ¡contacté con ellos para proclamar su buena noticia! ¡Estaban muy interesados!».

languages.text: 「あなたの名声はいや増すばかりです！私にはわかります。何しろ、あの修道院に閉じ込められる前に、何人か...さまざまな{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}奇妙なモノ{/g}を調達することを得意とする友人がおりました…人々が禁じられていると思い込んでいる驚くようなものをね。解放されて間もなく、私はあなたのことを伝え広めるべく彼らに連絡したのです！ああ、彼らがどれほど興味をそそられていたことか！」
languages.original_text: "Your fame grows! I can tell — after all, before I was confined to that monastery, I made some... friends who were very good at procuring all manner of {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}oddities{/g} — remarkable things that people mistakenly brand as forbidden. Shortly after my release, I contacted them to spread the good word about you! Oh, how intrigued they were!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの名声はいや増すばかりです！私にはわかります。何しろ、あの修道院に閉じ込められる前に、何人か...さまざまな奇妙なモノを調達することを得意とする友人がおりました…人々が禁じられていると思い込んでいる驚くようなものをね。解放されて間もなく、私はあなたのことを伝え広めるべく彼らに連絡したのです！ああ、彼らがどれほど興味をそそられていたことか！」

languages.text: “您的名声越来越响亮！这一点我看得出来，毕竟我被丢进修道院之前，曾结交过一群朋友……他们非常擅长买卖各{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}种稀奇古怪的东西{/g}，就是那种会让人们误以为是违禁品的东西。我从修道院出来之后不久，就联系了他们，告诉了他们您的光辉事迹！噢，他们简直都听得入迷了！”
languages.original_text: "Your fame grows! I can tell — after all, before I was confined to that monastery, I made some... friends who were very good at procuring all manner of {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}oddities{/g} — remarkable things that people mistakenly brand as forbidden. Shortly after my release, I contacted them to spread the good word about you! Oh, how intrigued they were!"

traits.locale_text: “您的名声越来越响亮！这一点我看得出来，毕竟我被丢进修道院之前，曾结交过一群朋友……他们非常擅长买卖各种稀奇古怪的东西，就是那种会让人们误以为是违禁品的东西。我从修道院出来之后不久，就联系了他们，告诉了他们您的光辉事迹！噢，他们简直都听得入迷了！”

languages.text: "Namınız giderek büyüyor! Nihayetinde ben o manastıra kapatılmadan önce bazı... Arkadaşlar edinmiştim. Çeşit çeşit {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}tuhaf nesne{/g} temin etmek konusunda çok iyi olan bazı arkadaşlar... İnsanların hataya düşerek yasaklı olarak addettiği, harikulade nesneler... Serbest kaldıktan kısa süre sonra onlarla iletişime geçerek şanınızı yaymalarını sağladım! Ah, ne kadar da heyecanlandılar!"
languages.original_text: "Your fame grows! I can tell — after all, before I was confined to that monastery, I made some... friends who were very good at procuring all manner of {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMissionGlossary}oddities{/g} — remarkable things that people mistakenly brand as forbidden. Shortly after my release, I contacted them to spread the good word about you! Oh, how intrigued they were!"
